dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SHUT UP! SHUT UP!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Burning Man YELLS and raises his arm in accusation... ...and FIRE RACES OUT FROM BEHIND HIM, flowing over the w the ceiling, the floor, racing for Miller like a rising  tide...

dialogues.speaker: CONTAINMENT
dialogues.text: Miller runs. Dead ahead, the First Containment...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Miller runs fast. The fire is faster, flooding in behind  him. Miller dashes for the Second Seal as IT BEGINS TO CLOSE. fire gains on him, surrounding him. Miller dives through the Second Seal...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...barely makes it... ...SLAMS into the engineering console. Miller looks back the Second Seal. It's still open by a fraction when the f hits it... ...SENDING A LANCE OF FLAME stabbing out towards Miller. rolls aside as the fire hits the console. The console  EXPLODES. The Second Seal shuts tight, cutting the fire off. The pa on the Second Seal begins to bubble and scorch... and the cools as the fire subsides. Miller gets to his feet. Almost allows himself to relax.  Then he sees his shadow before him, dancing in the growin red light. He turns...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Second Containment is a holocaust. Fire swarms over t walls. Burning jelly drips from Control Spikes. The Core  itself is a blazing orb; the gyroscope that holds it glow red-hot. Miller stares at the blazing Core.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't leave me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Miller turns. The Burning Man stands RIGHT BESIDE HIM. He SMASHES Miller with a backhand that ignites Miller's  clothes and sends him flying. The detonator falls from  Miller's grasp, lost beneath two feet of coolant. Miller  comes up CHOKING and SPLUTTERING. The Burning Man stalks towards Miller. The coolant STEAMS and SIZZLES at his feet. Miller stares at the Burning Man as he approaches. Slowly rises to his feet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're not Edmund Corrick.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Burning Man's flames wane, revealing Weir's misshapen form. Miller throws a wicked right. Weir catches Miller's fist. SQUEEZES until blood wells up between his fingers. Then s Miller against a cooling tank with BONE CRACKING force. M collapses into the slime, barely able to raise his head t breathe. Weir slowly approaches.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You want me to believe you're the  Devil, well, I don't, that's bullshit!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not the Devil.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then what, what are you? Tell me...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Better if I just show you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Weir's hands reach down and he grabs Miller by the skull. Miller GASPS as he sees...

dialogues.speaker: SERIES OF SHOTS
dialogues.text: Faster than the eye can see. More than mind can accept...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ORIGINAL CREW writhe naked and bloody in carnivorous  frenzy...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peters' bloody grinning child, devouring his mother...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MILLER writhes in Weir's grip. His hands flail out to the sides. One hand brushes a long steel cannister sunk in th muck. A CO2 scrubber...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DJ's dissected body, except that here, DJ looks up, and  smiles...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AN ALIEN SUN, red and bloated and dying.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AN ALIEN TERRAIN; a sluggish, oily, black sea. A hand rea from the oil...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLAIRE floating dead in a bathtub filled with the thick b fluid...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Justin, Starck and Cooper, crucified upside-down upon the Third Seal...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NO!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His hand closes on the scrubber and he swings it across W head. Weir reels back, stunned. Miller gets to his feet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can't have them!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He hits Weir again. HARD. Blood gushes from Weir's skull, filling the runes on his face. Weir staggers. Miller attacks. Again and again and again. This time Weir is ready. He catches the scrubber and tear it from Miller's grasp. SMASHES Miller to the floor with single blow. Miller GROANS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not the Devil. I'm much, much  older. I watched the Beginning and I  will see the End. I am the dark behind  the stars. I am the dark inside you  all.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Miller gets to all fours, trying to get up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...not the Devil...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Weir kicks Miller savagely. Miller slides through the coo comes to rest beneath a walkway. He attempts to rise,  collapses back into the sludge. Weir slowly stalks towards him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is no Devil. There is no God.  There is only... NOTHING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're lying...!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not asking you to believe me.  You'll see for yourself... and so  will your crew. You're all coming  with me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Starck... Cooper...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Weir's grotesque face is inches from his. He reaches down and pulls Miller from the dripping ooze...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They are mine. And so are you...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...as Miller clears the surface, he holds something in hi fist. Miller stares dead-on into Weir's hellish face... ...and raises his right hand. HE'S HOLDING THE DETONATOR.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (a grim smile of  triumph) You can't have them. Go to hell.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NOOO!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A small, silent EXPLOSION blossoms in the aft section of ship...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...followed frames later by a sequence of DETONATIONS tha rip the Main Access Corridor apart and propel the foredec away from the containment section.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The EXPLOSION knocks Starck and Cooper down. They hold on tightly as...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Waves of distortion ripple over the Event Horizon's  containment section... A dark sphere of energy spreads out from the containment the gateway opens... A BLACK HOLE... The black hole begins to shrink, imploding. As it collaps it sucks Neptune's blue clouds with it, creating a TITANI WHIRLPOOL with the black hole at its center... The SHRIEKING winds carry the foredecks back towards the  whirlpool, towards the black hole...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cooper and Starck slide across the floor as the deck tips a terrific angle...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The foredecks teeter on the edge of oblivion... The black hole collapses utterly, vanishing to a point. A enormous SHOCKWAVE rips out from the point of implosion. The foredecks ride the wave away from the implosion and o of Neptune's atmosphere to safety...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The VIBRATIONS subside. Cooper and Starck stagger to thei feet. Look out the window...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Neptune recedes, the ugly hole of the implosion already b erased by Neptune's violent winds...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Starck's voice is tiny.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Miller...

dialogues.speaker: SPACE
dialogues.text: Black planets silhouetted by a dying red giant. The  Engineering Containment of the Event Horizon drifts in th eddies of gas that swirl and spiral into the bloated star MOVE towards the ship until its shadow consumes all...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Starck awakens but the SCREAMS continue as the Event Hori calls out to her... she SCREAMS... hands on her body... t CRIES stop... Starck looks around uncomprehending at the faces around h

dialogues.speaker: IT'S A RESCUE TEAM
dialogues.text: Cooper pushes them aside. She clings to him, CRYING...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's over, hush now, it's over...
